comments.author: DrFutzLoop.5316
comments.body: Does pretty good.. however the list that it creates is huge.. possibly consider after the “select server” menu have a “select zone” menu to narrow down the findings.

comments.author: AllIsVain.6409
comments.body:
http://www.reddit.com/r/Guildwars2/comments/1er2v3/api_example/

Load that up and you have a page that shows all events on your server and their status.

The API is very useful and I plan to make a few things from it.

Thanks for the work guys on the API team!
